attributes.action: Ban the anti social playing of mobile phone music on all public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned request that the playing of loud music from mobile phones be banned from all public transport including buses, coaches, trains and trams.  The noise is anti social, bad mannered and results in an uncomfortable journey for all paying passengers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
